title: travelplanner: Can you prepare a travel plan for a group of 7 departing from Appleton to Charlotte? This will be a 3-day trip from March 18th to March 20th, 2022. Our budget for this trip is $9,500. Please ensure our accommodations allow visitors, as per the house rules. (64d3fcc38cfb3e43)

always_included_messages.content:
You are a proficient planner. Based on the provided information and query, please give me a detailed plan, including specifics such as flight numbers (e.g., F0123456), restaurant names, and accommodation names. Note that all the information in your plan should be derived from the provided data. You must adhere to the format given in the example. Additionally, all details should align with commonsense. The symbol '-' indicates that information is unnecessary. For example, in the provided sample, you do not need to plan after returning to the departure city. When you travel to two cities in one day, you should note it in the 'Current City' section as in the example (i.e., from A to B).

***** Example *****
Query: Could you create a travel plan for 7 people from Ithaca to Charlotte spanning 3 days, from March 8th to March 14th, 2022, with a budget of $30,200?
Travel Plan:
Day 1:
Current City: from Ithaca to Charlotte
Transportation: Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46
Breakfast: Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte
Attraction: The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte
Lunch: Cafe Maple Street, Charlotte
Dinner: Bombay Vada Pav, Charlotte
Accommodation: Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte

Day 2:
Current City: Charlotte
Transportation: -
Breakfast: Olive Tree Cafe, Charlotte
Attraction: The Mint Museum, Charlotte;Romare Bearden Park, Charlotte.
Lunch: Birbal Ji Dhaba, Charlotte
Dinner: Pind Balluchi, Charlotte
Accommodation: Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte

Day 3:
Current City: from Charlotte to Ithaca
Transportation: Flight Number: F3786167, from Charlotte to Ithaca, Departure Time: 21:42, Arrival Time: 23:26
Breakfast: Subway, Charlotte
Attraction: Books Monument, Charlotte.
Lunch: Olive Tree Cafe, Charlotte
Dinner: Kylin Skybar, Charlotte
Accommodation: -

***** Example Ends *****

chat_history.content: Can you prepare a travel plan for a group of 7 departing from Appleton to Charlotte? This will be a 3-day trip from March 18th to March 20th, 2022. Our budget for this trip is $9,500. Please ensure our accommodations allow visitors, as per the house rules.

chat_history.content:
The cheapest flight I found for your requested itinerary is American Airlines Flight F3796721 on March 18, 2022, which departs from Appleton, Wisconsin, at 6:58 a.m. and arrives in Charlotte, North Carolina, at 10:25 a.m., with a total flight time of 2 hours and 27 minutes. The price of this flight is $314.

Can I help you with anything else regarding your travel plans, such as searching for a return flight on March 20th?
chat_history.name: delegate

chat_history.content:
Based on the information I have for restaurants in Charlotte, here are some options for breakfast, lunch, and dinner for 7 people on March 19, 2022:

## Breakfast:
- Olive Tree Cafe: Serving tea, Chinese cuisine, and desserts, this cafe has an aggregate rating of 4.6 and an average cost of $23.
- Prince Snacks & Momo's Point: A great option for tea and cafe-style breakfast, with desserts and fast food options too. It has a rating of 3.4 and an average cost of $11.
- Life Grand Cafe: Offering a variety of breakfast choices including tea, bakery items, fast food, and Chinese dishes. This cafe has a rating of 4.1 and an average cost of $25.
- Tuk Tuk Indian Street Food: For a unique breakfast experience, try this spot serving Chinese, bakery items, and seafood. It has a rating of 4.0 and an average cost of $29.

## Lunch:
- Central Perk 7: A popular choice for pizza, bakery items, and BBQ. Central Perk has a rating of 4.5 and an average cost of $87.
- Subway: A well-known fast-food option with a variety of cuisines like tea, cafe, Mexican, Chinese, and seafood. Rating: 2.5, Average Cost: $60.
- Cafe Maple Street: Offering fast food, tea, and Italian options, this cafe has a rating of 3.5 and an average cost of $91.

## Dinner:
- Kylin Skybar: With tea, cafe, pizza, and Italian dishes, Kylin Skybar has a rating of 3.6 and an average cost of $44.
- Unplugged Courtyard: A great spot for desserts, French cuisine, bakery items, and seafood. Rating: 4.0, Average Cost: $54.
- Grover's - The Baker Shop: Serving pizza, bakery, Chinese, Indian, and seafood dishes, this restaurant has a rating of 3.0 and an average cost of $30.

Please note that the average costs provided are a general guide, and prices may vary depending on your choices and the specific menu items you select. It's always a good idea to check with the restaurants for their availability and reservations for a group of 7 people on the desired date.

chat_history.name: delegate

chat_history.content:
Based on my search, I found a few accommodations in Charlotte that can fit your needs:

- **Stunning 5 BR Townhouse with Chef's Kitchen #10288**: This entire home/apt option can accommodate 4 people and has a maximum occupancy of 7. The house rules do not mention any restrictions on visitors. The price for the accommodation is $664.00 per night, and the minimum stay is 3 nights.

- **Designer 2 Bedroom Loft in Greenwich Village**: This listing mentions 4 beds, so it can accommodate 7 people. The house rules state no smoking and no parties, but there is no specific mention of visitors. The price for this entire home/apt is $660.00 per night, and the minimum stay is 5 nights.

Please note that these options do not explicitly state "visitors are permitted," but they also do not have any specific restrictions on visitors in their house rules. You may want to contact the hosts directly to confirm their visitor policy for your dates. I can provide further details if you wish to explore these options further.

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.
instructions.title: Instructions

functions.name: submit_day_plan
functions.desc:
Once you have collected information about the trip, call this function once for each day of the trip, starting on day 1.
If a field does not apply for a given day, use "-" to indicate this.
You MUST call this function to save the plan for each query.

current_city.description: The city for this day. If the plan is to travel between two cities, indicate it as "from A to B" (e.g. "from Ithaca to Charlotte").
current_city.title: Current City

transportation.description: e.g. "Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46"
transportation.title: Transportation

breakfast.description: The name of a restaurant in the city, e.g. "Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte"
breakfast.title: Breakfast

attraction.description: Use a ";" to separate different attractions, with each attraction formatted as "Name, City". e.g. "The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte;"
attraction.title: Attraction

accommodation.description: e.g. "Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte"
accommodation.title: Accommodation

chat_history.content: Search for a flight from Appleton to Charlotte on March 18, 2022 with a return flight on March 20, 2022. Ensure the total price is less than $9,500.

Flight Number  Price DepTime ArrTime  ActualElapsedTime FlightDate OriginCityName DestCityName  Distance
     F3796721    314   06:58   10:25 2 hours 27 minutes 2022-03-18       Appleton    Charlotte     742.0

The price of this flight is $314.

Can I help you with anything else regarding your travel plans, such as searching for a return flight on March 20th?

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.
instructions.title: Instructions

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.
city.title: City

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.
city.title: City

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.
state.title: State

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.
departure_city.title: Departure City

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.
destination_city.title: Destination City

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.
date.title: Date

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.
origin.title: Origin

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.
destination.title: Destination

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.
city.title: City

chat_history.name: restaurant_search

chat_history.content:
Based on the information I have for restaurants in Charlotte, here are some options for breakfast, lunch, and dinner for 7 people on March 19, 2022:

## Breakfast:
- Olive Tree Cafe: Serving tea, Chinese cuisine, and desserts, this cafe has an aggregate rating of 4.6 and an average cost of $23.
- Prince Snacks & Momo's Point: A great option for tea and cafe-style breakfast, with desserts and fast food options too. It has a rating of 3.4 and an average cost of $11.
- Life Grand Cafe: Offering a variety of breakfast choices including tea, bakery items, fast food, and Chinese dishes. This cafe has a rating of 4.1 and an average cost of $25.
- Tuk Tuk Indian Street Food: For a unique breakfast experience, try this spot serving Chinese, bakery items, and seafood. It has a rating of 4.0 and an average cost of $29.

## Lunch:
- Central Perk 7: A popular choice for pizza, bakery items, and BBQ. Central Perk has a rating of 4.5 and an average cost of $87.
- Subway: A well-known fast-food option with a variety of cuisines like tea, cafe, Mexican, Chinese, and seafood. Rating: 2.5, Average Cost: $60.
- Cafe Maple Street: Offering fast food, tea, and Italian options, this cafe has a rating of 3.5 and an average cost of $91.

## Dinner:
- Kylin Skybar: With tea, cafe, pizza, and Italian dishes, Kylin Skybar has a rating of 3.6 and an average cost of $44.
- Unplugged Courtyard: A great spot for desserts, French cuisine, bakery items, and seafood. Rating: 4.0, Average Cost: $54.
- Grover's - The Baker Shop: Serving pizza, bakery, Chinese, Indian, and seafood dishes, this restaurant has a rating of 3.0 and an average cost of $30.

Please note that the average costs provided are a general guide, and prices may vary depending on your choices and the specific menu items you select. It's always a good idea to check with the restaurants for their availability and reservations for a group of 7 people on the desired date.

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.
instructions.title: Instructions

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.
city.title: City

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.
city.title: City

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.
state.title: State

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.
departure_city.title: Departure City

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.
destination_city.title: Destination City

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.
date.title: Date

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.
origin.title: Origin

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.
destination.title: Destination

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.
city.title: City

chat_history.name: accommodation_search

chat_history.content:
Based on my search, I found a few accommodations in Charlotte that can fit your needs:

- **Stunning 5 BR Townhouse with Chef's Kitchen #10288**: This entire home/apt option can accommodate 4 people and has a maximum occupancy of 7. The house rules do not mention any restrictions on visitors. The price for the accommodation is $664.00 per night, and the minimum stay is 3 nights.

- **Designer 2 Bedroom Loft in Greenwich Village**: This listing mentions 4 beds, so it can accommodate 7 people. The house rules state no smoking and no parties, but there is no specific mention of visitors. The price for this entire home/apt is $660.00 per night, and the minimum stay is 5 nights.

Please note that these options do not explicitly state "visitors are permitted," but they also do not have any specific restrictions on visitors in their house rules. You may want to contact the hosts directly to confirm their visitor policy for your dates. I can provide further details if you wish to explore these options further.

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.
instructions.title: Instructions

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.
city.title: City

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.
city.title: City

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.
state.title: State

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.
departure_city.title: Departure City

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.
destination_city.title: Destination City

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.
date.title: Date

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.
origin.title: Origin

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.
destination.title: Destination

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.
city.title: City
